description: Graphs of remote caching and execution

targets.query:
q = (bucket) =>
  from(bucket: bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "indicators" and r._field == "hit_fraction_remote" and r.goals == "test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.context, set: ["ci_branch", "ci_pull_request"]))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

union(tables: [q(bucket: "pantsbuild/pants"), q(bucket: "toolchainlabs/toolchain"), q(bucket: "color/color")])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: duration(v: 10 * int(v: v.windowPeriod)), fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

panels.description: NB: 4XXs caused by cancellation are harmless. See https://github.com/toolchainlabs/toolchain/issues/9889
panels.title: ALB Non-200 Status

title: Remote Cache and Execution
